name: CX-Programmer Project File
summary: Learn about .CXP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: CX-Programmer is now included as part of CX-One and is no longer offered as a standalone product.

description: Project file created by CX-Programmer, a program used for programming OMRON PLCs (programmable logic controllers); saves user programs and parameters; stored in a compressed format and is the compressed version of a .CXT file.
